tit.e: Choyo Gakko (a three-story school with tile-roofing in western style)
tit.cmt: 次行と重複するのでカッコ内は削除。

sen.j: 朝暘学校（ちょうようがっこう）は、1876年（明治9年）に県令三島通庸の命により現在の鶴岡市役所の敷地内に建設された洋風瓦葺3階建ての学校のことである。
sen.e: Choyo Gakko was a three-story school with tile-roofing in western style, which was built in the premises of the current Tsuruoka City Hall by order of prefectural governor Michitsune MISHIMA in 1876.
Choyo Gakko was a three-story school with tile-roofing in western style, which was built in the premises of the current Tsuruoka City Hall by order of prefectural governor Michitsune MISHIMA in 1876.

sen.j: そもそも鶴岡には藩校として致道館が存在した。
sen.e: Chido-kan (Confucian school) was located in Furuoka as a hanko (domain school).
Traditionally, Chido-kan (Confucian school) was located in Tsuruoka as a hanko (domain school).
Traditionally, Chido-kan (Confucian school) was located in Tsuruoka as a hanko (domain school).

sen.j: しかし、県令三島通庸はあえて洋風の学校を建設した。
sen.e: However, prefectural governor Michitsune MISHIMA built a western-style school.
However, prefectural governor Michitsune MISHIMA built a western-style school.
However, prefectural governor Michitsune MISHIMA built a western-style school.

sen.j: これは明治政府に対する反感の強かったこの地方に、新政府の威光と新しい時代が始まったことを告げるねらいがあった。
sen.e: This was because he wished to notify the region that was antipathetic to the Meiji government of the prestige of the new government and the beginning of a new era.
This was because he intended to notify the region where the people were antipathetic to the Meiji government of the prestige of the new government and the beginning of a new era.
sen.cmt: wished → intendedthe region that was antipathetic to → the region where the people were antipathetic to
sen.e: This was because he intended to notify the region where the people were antipathetic to the Meiji government of the prestige of the new government and the beginning of a new era.

sen.j: そのため東京市参事での銀座煉瓦街建設の経験から当時の最高レベルの人材を集め、学校建設に力を注いだのである。
sen.e: He made efforts to muster top-level resources and build the school from his experience of construction of Ginza Renga-gai (brick town or brick street) in the Tokyo city council.
He made efforts to muster top-level human resources and build the school from his experience of construction of Ginza Renga-gai (brick town or brick street) when he was a counselor of the Tokyo city.
sen.cmt: 「東京市の参事を務めた経験」と考えて、when he was a counselor of the Tokyo city としました。
sen.e: He made efforts to muster top-level human resources and build the school from his experience of construction of Ginza Renga-gai (brick town or brick street) when he was a counselor of the Tokyo city.

sen.j: 朝暘の名前は現在も鶴岡市内の小学校名として残っている。
sen.e: The name of Choyo now remains as the name of a primary school in Tsuruoka City.
